notes.note:
Invalid page rendering with hardware acceleration enabled ([Bug 1435472][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1435472

Windows 7 users with touch screens or certain 3rd party desktop applications which interact with Firefox through accessibility services may experience random browser crashes. Known 3rd party applications with issues: StickyPassword, Windows 7 touch screen. ([Bug 1424505][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1424505

Browser keyboard shortcuts (eg copy Ctrl+C) don't work on sites that use those keys with resistFingerprinting enabled ([Bug 1433592][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1433592

High CPU / memory churn caused by third-party software on some computers ([Bug 1446280][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1446280

Users who have configured an "automatic proxy configuration URL" and want to reload their proxy settings from the URL will find the Reload button disabled in the Connection Settings dialog when they select Preferences/Options > Network Proxy > Settings... ([Bug 1445991][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1445991

URL fragment identifiers break Service Worker responses ([Bug 1443850][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1443850

Users trying to cancel a print around the time it completes will continue to get intermittent crashes ([Bug 1441598][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1441598

Broken getUserMedia (audio) on DragonFly, FreeBSD, NetBSD, OpenBSD. Video chat apps either wouldn't work or be always muted ([Bug 1444074][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1444074
